mapper.select: select * from nursing_plan where status = 1 order by create_time desc

select p.*, su.real_name as creator from nursing_plan p left join sys_user su on p.create_by = su.id
and p.plan_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and p.status = #{status}
order by p.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into nursing_plan (plan_name, sort_no, status, remark, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{sortNo}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: select p.*, su.real_name as creator from nursing_plan p left join sys_user su on p.create_by = su.id where p.id = #{id}
select project_id from nursing_project_plan where plan_id = #{planId}

select npp.project_id as projectId, np.name as projectName, npp.execute_time as executeTime, npp.execute_cycle as executeCycle, npp.execute_frequency as executeFrequency from nursing_project_plan npp left join nursing_project np on npp.project_id = np.id where npp.plan_id = #{planId}
mapper.insert: insert into nursing_project_plan (plan_id, project_id, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, execute_time, execute_cycle, execute_frequency) values (#{planId}, #{projectId}, #{createBy}, #{createBy}, NOW(), NOW(), #{executeTime}, #{executeCycle}, #{executeFrequency})
